ModMetaData.name: Variety Matters Redux
ModMetaData.author: Evyatar108
ModMetaData.description: Pawns now have a new need: variety in their diet. This mod introduces a unique gameplay dynamic where pawns require different types of food to stay mentally healthy and happy. Instead of just eating for survival, pawns will now seek out a diverse range of meals to satisfy their craving for variety. This new need adds an engaging layer of complexity to the colony's food management.
